holidays.name: World Teachers' Day
holidays.description: A day to celebrate educators worldwide and recognize their vital contribution to society and development.
holidays.origin: Established in 1994 by UNESCO to commemorate the signing of the 1966 UNESCO/ILO Recommendation concerning the Status of Teachers.

holidays.name: National Hostess Twinkie Day
holidays.description: A tongue-in-cheek tribute to the iconic cream-filled sponge cake snack, celebrating its quirky place in American snacking history.
